detail_desc: Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a chest pocket and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Top in airy jersey with a print motif on the front, braided detail at the top and asymmetric raw-edge hem.
Top in airy jersey with a print motif on the front, braided detail at the top and asymmetric raw-edge hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and skinny legs with sewn-in creases.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and raw-edge hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length skirt in sturdy, bonded twill with a slight sheen. Tab with a metal buckle at the waist, wrapover with inner buttons, side pockets and an asymmetric hem at the front. Lined.
5-pocket sturdy washed denim jeans in a loose fit with a high waist, button fly, low crotch and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Long shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Satin nightslip with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Decorative ties and lace details at the back and a lace trim at the hem.
Top in slub cotton jersey with a motif and short, flounced sleeves.
Shorts in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shorts in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shorts in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Lightly padded nylon bomber jacket with embroidery details, appliquéd badges, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped sleeve pocket. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a small frill trim around the neckline and long, wide sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs. Open at the top with a narrow tie.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a small frill trim around the neckline and long, wide sleeves with a drawstring at the cuffs. Open at the top with a narrow tie.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side. Unlined.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slits at the hems.
Pull-on trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave. Adjustable elasticated waist with a decorative drawstring, zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Pull-on trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave. Adjustable elasticated waist with a decorative drawstring, zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Loose-fitting jumper with low dropped shoulders in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 2-3Y) and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.

Strapless balconette bras in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the top of the back and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Fitted shirt in washed stretch denim with embroidery at the top, a collar and pearly press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Parka in a cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, embroidered motif at the top, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Decorative drawstring and adjustable elastication at the waist, front pockets, long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Alice band covered in fabric containing glittery threads, decorated with a large bow.
Top with 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the sides for the best fit.
Dance shoes in shimmering imitation leather with elastication around the top and faux fur pompoms on the front. Woven cotton linings and soft suede soles.
Grosgrain-covered metal Alice band decorated with ears covered with fabric flowers.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with decorative beads on the front, a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops and an embroidered detail on the shaft.
